name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh basil, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Grilled chicken patty with lettuce, tomato, and house special sauce.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with parmesan cheese and grilled chicken.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup and mayo.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Delicious homemade brownie with chocolate sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and garlic aioli sauce.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Thick and creamy strawberry milkshake topped with whipped cream.
